grid_uv.Comment0: grid_uv specifies the source. i.e. divide the source texture in a 3x3 grid and set the UVs for each tile

borders.Comment0: The default size of borders during display: Widgets may be resized, but their borders will always be this same size (unless changed explicitly via setClipBorders)

skin name.Comment1: colour can either have 3 or 4 elements (RGB vs RGBA)
skin name.copy_from: other skin name that must've been defined first (i.e. before this skin)!

Pack Name.comment: Using auto, base_name will be appended the different suffixes e.g. We will look for base_name_disabled. If it is not found, the only one we assume it must be defined is base_name_idle
